mapper.delete: delete from tj_device_total where xq_code = #{xqCode} and device_code = #{deviceType}
mapper.select:
select sum(dt.total_device) as totalNum,sum(dt.online) as onlineNum from tj_device_total as dt inner join ht_xq_wy as xw on dt.xq_code=xw.xq_code and xw.status=0 inner join ht_wy_info as wy on xw.wy_code=wy.wy_code inner join tj_device_type t on dt.device_code=t.device_code inner join ht_xq_info xq on dt.xq_code=xq.code inner join (select area_id from ht_area where parent_ids like concat('%',#{params.areaId},'%')) area on area.area_id=xq.sso_regionalcode where 1=1
and dt.xq_code in (${params.xqCode})
and wy.wy_code in (${params.wyCode})

select t.device_name as deviceName,dt.device_code as deviceCode,sum(dt.total_device) as totalDevice,sum(dt.online) online from tj_device_total as dt inner join ht_xq_wy as xw on dt.xq_code=xw.xq_code and xw.status=0 inner join ht_wy_info as wy on xw.wy_code=wy.wy_code inner join tj_device_type t on dt.device_code=t.device_code inner join ht_xq_info xq on dt.xq_code=xq.code inner join (select area_id from ht_area where parent_ids like concat('%',#{params.areaId},'%')) area on area.area_id=xq.sso_regionalcode where 1=1
and dt.xq_code in (${params.xqCode})
and wy.wy_code in (${params.wyCode})
group by t.device_name,dt.device_code
